entities.name: creevey brothers
entities.description: The Creevey brothers are mentioned as trying to bewitch the badges to make them say Support Harry Potter! instead of Support Cedric Diggory!. They are described as having managed to get the badges stuck on POTTER STINKS.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: Cedric Diggory is mentioned in the context of the Support Cedric Diggory! badges that the Creevey brothers are trying to bewitch.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the one whose name the Creevey brothers are trying to replace on the badges. He is also the main character of the story and is described as creeping past the Creevey brothers.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as opening the Fat Lady for Harry from outside as they had planned.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a portrait that Hermione opens for Harry to pass through.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as having a cabin in the grounds where Harry walks down the lawn towards the lights shining.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is mentioned as talking inside the Beauxbatons carriage.

entities.name: beauxbatons carriage
entities.description: The Beauxbatons carriage is described as being lit up and having Madame Maxime talking inside it.

relationships.description: The Creevey brothers are trying to replace Harry Potter's name on the badges with Cedric Diggory's name.
Hermione opens the Fat Lady for Harry to pass through.
